==================
Calibration module
==================

Overview
--------

.. automodule:: omg_dosimetry.calibration
    :no-members:

Running the Demo
----------------

To run the demo, import the main class and run the demo method:

.. plot::
    :include-source:

    from omg_dosimetry import LUT

    LUT.run_demo()

=================

------------

These are the classes a typical user may interface with.
